title: CTMS CEO to be Featured on Scully The World Show
text:
ctms CEO to be interviewed by Acclaimed Journalist
Toronto, ON (PRWEB) October 02, 2015
Corporate Travel Management Solutions (ctms), a leader in corporate travel, today announced ctms’ CEO that Tom Osovitzki, will be featured on American Broadcast Television’s (ABT) critically acclaimed television show, “Scully - The World Show.” A show dedicated to global innovators, Osovitzki’s one-on-one interview will take place in the Toronto area Sunday, October 4, 2015, 9:00 a.m.ET on WNED Buffalo.
This award-winning lifestyle program, hosted by Bob Scully, showcases in-depth interviews with the “world's most significant and famous personalities.” Each interview provides audiences with a comprehensive look into what makes these prominent individuals leaders within their chosen field and their greater impact on the world. Past guests of the show have included Bill Gates, Donald Trump, Henry Kissinger, Larry King and Ed Koch.
“I’m honoured by the opportunity to be a guest on such a leading television program,” says Tom Osovitzki, Chief Executive Officer of ctms Travel. “To be interviewed on the same platform as many leading entrepreneurs, I am honoured to be among their company. I’m really humbled and excited for this incredible experience.”
With a particular penchant for entrepreneurs, “Scully-The World Show” has been on the air, uninterrupted, for over 28 years. Garnering multiple Gemini television awards, host Bob Scully has interviewed noted dignitaries, world leaders, renowned authors, global influencers and more. Based out of Montreal, Quebec, “The Scully – The World Show” airs in syndication and is distributed by the American Public Television channel and distributed in over 200 stations across The United States. For more information regarding Osovitzki’s upcoming interview, please email info(at)ctmstravel(dot)com.
